sentences.en: He came from a respectable if impecunious family.
sentences.cn: 他来自一个没钱但受人尊重的家庭。

sentences.en: He is impecunious, does not know anyone who can lend mony.
sentences.cn: 他身无分文，也不认识任何可以借钱的人。

sentences.en: Pass do sthagain one time this, wang Yu is heavily in debt already, impecunious.
sentences.cn: 经过这一番折腾, 汪宇早已负债累累, 身无分文.

sentences.en: They are independent, impecunious and able to tolerate all degrees of discomfort.
sentences.cn: 他们独立自主的, 囊中羞涩的,并且能够忍受各种不便.

sentences.en: They are invariably independent, impecunious and able to tolerate staggering degrees of discomfort.
sentences.cn: 他们无一不是独立自主 、 囊中羞涩,而且能够忍受种种令人咋舌不已的不便.

trans.tran_en: having very little money, especially over a long period – sometimes used humorously
